record.creatorPhotographer: Martyn, Edward W.; Martyn's Maroon Studio
record.description: Three Quarter Club, University of Chicago, autumn 1901. Initiation of the freshman honor society, seated, left to right: Hewitt, Hunter, unidentified member, Nettleton, and Hook; standing: Brode, Johnson, Gitz, Bob Murray, Lowell, Pardee (in sun-bonnet below), Terry, Baird, MacDonald, C. W. Sills, Wright, and an unidentified member.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Negative on file. Remainder of caption not legible. University Archives Record stamp.
